text: The Snow Queen () is a 1967 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Gennadi Kazansky.От "Карнавальной ночи" до "Елок": любимое кино для новогодних праздниковСнежная королева It stars Valery Nikitenko, Elena Proklova, and Slava Ziupa. == Actors == * Valery Nikitenko – The Storyteller * Elena Proklova – Gerda * Slava Ziupa – Kay * Evgenia Melnikova – Grandmother * Natalia Klimova – The Snow Queen * Nikolai Boyarsky – Counselor == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Gennadi Kazansky
title: The Snow Queen (1967 movie)
